txt.en: 'Intruders! Slay them!'
Instance: The Eldest House
'You look surprised, dwarf-woman. Are you?'
'You're too late... Allaban will come... for you!'
'What do you think happens to those who dare to trifle with the Iron Crown, you little fool?'
'It's too dangerous to remain here...'
'It matters not. You shall know soon enough!'
'Over here, [placeholder]... but quietly now!'
'I've heard enough.'
'You four... capture them!'
'Come with us, Thrástan. Let us help you get out of here!'
'In the name of Durin, stand aside or die!'
'Bah!'
'Baruk Khazâd! Khazâd ai-mênu!'
'By Durin's beard...'
'As the Angmarim attack, you hear the battlecry of Hermáth Stormhammer in the distance!'
'Hersegg! [placeholder]!'
'Let us see where this passage leads, [placeholder]...'
'Lay down your shovels and begone, villains!'
'Only Durin... or the Shaper... may do what you ask...'
'Enough! You are undeserving of my mercy!'
'I will ask again. How do we reignite the white forge?'
'You see, my master, Allaban, desires only the elder dwarf. Your fates are of no concern to him.'
'What does Allaban want with this one anyway?'
'Let this house be your tomb!'
'Answer, dwarf!'
'Is that so? We shall see about that!'
